summary: A test suite that validates the creation, configuration‑based instantiation, checkpoint loading (including fused batch‑norm variants), and save/restore behavior of speech‑recognition models (CTC and RNNT) optionally combined with a text‑to‑speech component.
business_intent: Guarantee that hybrid ASR‑TTS models function correctly and can be reliably deployed in speech processing pipelines, supporting both transcription and synthesis use cases.
